title: The Tank Of Legends!
body:
This meta is so fked XD

Tank do more than champions who build full damage.

Some examples for this champions is:

{{champion:111}}  {{champion:113}}  {{champion:106}}  {{champion:48}}  {{champion:77}}  {{champion:420}} and heaps more

like {{champion:245}} can build full tank and still demolish anyone.

Was just wondering if riot was ever gonna do something about this cause literally in a game yesterday a shen was able to outdamage zed even though zed hit all his skillshots and aa before the ult popped and shen barely took any damage and killed zed LOL

replies.body: I do agree but you also have to take into account who you're playing and the ranks involved. Those mentioned champions are not universally strong to any player. Like I said though, if you know enough of builds and the champions limits they are all on the higher side of the unbalanced scale.

They aren't unbalanced, to use something out of the recent rito podcast on the state of the game, a tank is deemed balanced at around a 52% win rate, as the fact that you have that champ on your team, means you have a tank, and are probably already at an advantage.

Well tbh, they can "define" it that way if they choose to but in reality when you take into account the amount of champions who are above that ratio and the champions below that ratio the definition of balance is the in between. I hardly think that anything above 52% is balanced. Just imo though. I still acknowledge you're point, though I disagree by definition only.

Just build % pen items and watch as they basically turn into a squishy.

Legitimately, there are 2 (/3 since the last whisper items have two items that it builds into.) that hard counter any tank.

I have played tanks, and you may as well change to full damage if anyone gets any of those items.

Tbh i would expect a Shen to win against a Zed even in a non tank meta.
Shen is a tank with shitloads of armour, Zed is a AD assassin who builds damage instead of magic resist. 
Tanks counter Assassins. And if a Zed could burst a tank Shen from 100-0 then THAT would be the biggest problem of all.
How the Shen managed to fucking catch the Zed in order to kill him tho... is a mystery.

But you're right about the others, Voli might as well be an assassin himself he does so much damage.

theres no point building damage anymore, If you build Full AD darius, you get around 300/400 AD and are really squishy, if you build tank Darius, you get around 300 AD and 4000 more HP (I don't have a fucking clue how that works, but it does and its fucked)
Like this ekko built full tank and dove our whole team and didnt die but ended up killing our adc in the process
Sorry to say this but Zed got killed by the class of champions that are supposed to function best again him.
